Name: Frequency of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' followed by 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' occurs

Name: Percentage of manuscripts that reach 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' stage out of all manuscripts
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all cases where '' does not happen

Name: Number of times 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' occurs before 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' that lead to 'SW-EIC Major Revision'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' in relation to 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' followed by 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit'
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': "activity == 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'percentage', 'filter': "activity == 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit'"}

Name: Percentage of manuscripts that bypass 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' before reaching 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' out of all cases where 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' does not happen

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' as a precursor to 'SW-EIC Accept'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' followed by any form of decision ('SW-EIC Major Revision', 'SW-EIC Minor Revision', 'SW-EIC Accept', 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit')
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Number of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' occurrences grouped by month
Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' that are followed by a revision stage ('SW–Major Revision due in 1 week', 'SW–Minor Revision due in 3 days')
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': "activity == 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'percentage', 'filter': "activity == 'SW–Major Revision due in 1 week' || activity == 'SW–Minor Revision due in 3 days'"}

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' in manuscripts that require more than one round of review
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' in the total activities of the review process
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all cases where '' does not happen

Name: Number of times 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' is the final recorded activity for a manuscript
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' for cases where activity 'Manuscript is Withdrawn' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' followed by 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' in manuscripts that are eventually accepted for publication
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' in manuscripts that are rejected or withdrawn before publication
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation' out of all 'SW-EIC Reject'
